    Package Description
    xdi2.agent  
    xdi2.agent.routing  
    xdi2.agent.routing.impl  
    xdi2.client
    A client can send messages to an XDI endpoint and receive results.
    xdi2.client.events  
    xdi2.client.impl  
    xdi2.client.impl.http
    An XDI client that can send XDI messages via HTTP.
    xdi2.client.impl.local
    An XDI client that can "send" XDI messages to local Graph objects.
    xdi2.client.impl.websocket
    An XDI client that can send XDI messages via HTTP.
